comments.body: This looks like a nice refactoring in order to make consistent and simplify.

sorry for the late, I prefer not to do this. Since `RepartitionOperation` can affect the behavior of AQE, the semantics of `RepartitionOperation` have a little different from previous.

Currently, the `RepartitionOperation` behavior with AQE framwork follows:
* `Repartition` does not use AQE stage optimizer rules
* `RepartitionByExpression` depends on `optNumPartitions` and `partitionExpressions`
*  `RebalancePartitions`(if extend)  depends on `partitionExpressions`

And the rule `CollapseRepartition` may not effective in all use case.
